Game Play and Role Play Effects
Use Spell Effects that modify combat
These Spell Effects can modify the stats of spells being cast (damage, range, etc) and add new effects to the battlefield.
Use Spell Effects that modify Role Play
These Spell Effects can modify Role Playing situations, but will usually not have a drastic effect in combat.
At least one type of Spell Effect must be selected
